story:
Versión Español hacia abajo

 

English Version

Our Story

DC² 

We believe that each of us is here to pursue the things we dream of and long for, but that often it is hard to find support or encouragement in our modern world. We hope that if we pursue our dreams, and share every step of that journey with all of you, maybe we can inspire you to follow your own. And maybe we can all make the world a little bit better.

We are 3 friends, reunited by our love for music, taking a journey towards the dream we share.

We went to high school together, and it was then, that we started playing music as a group.

David, Chris and Chris. Our real names became our musical identity: DC²

Our bond. The chemistry created through playing guitar together.

Our goal. Create our music and share it with you.

Our purpose. To follow our hearts and show you that you can too.

We invite you to come along and be part of this adventure, to inspire you to follow your own dreams.

  

The Impact

We are creating an album.

Currently, we are all scattered around the world. One of us lives in Mexico (David), the other one in Dubai (Chris Tombrink) and the other in Singapore (Chris Thyssen).

Nevertheless, our bond for playing guitar together, has helped us come to the decision, to reunite and make something that will stay with us for the rest of our lives.

The variety and richness of opportunity available to people today, is enabling each of us to tell our stories in the way that comes most naturally to us. We have decided to make something that will not only be an audible experience, but a written and visual one as well.

We hope that by combining these different means of storytelling, we can take you on this journey, and you can be a part of writing this story with us.

Our adventure will take place in Mexico, traveling from Cancun to Tepoztlan, starting June 20th, 2012.

With 12 general locations to discover, over a 2,000km travel route, there's bound to be unexpected experiences and challenges along the way.

We want to involve you in our journey in the hopes of inspiring you to follow your own path, wherever that may lead.

We’ve decided to do this the only way that comes naturally to us, and that is by inviting you to be a part of what we hope may be the beginning of the rest of our lives. And maybe the path we take will help you to find your own, and walk the road less taken, towards everything you imagine.


 

What We Need & What You Get

The album we want to create is one that will involve you, from day 1 of the journey, till its post-production and release of the final material. In order for you to be able to follow us from beginning to end, we will need a few things that will allow you keep track of us:

 

1. Social Media Pages.

  - Facebook: The main page for interactive involvement. You will be able to view our timeline, from the founding of DC² beginning of 2007, up until now and everything else that is still to come, including videos of our past performances and a full library of pictures. And of course we will keep you updated on what we are doing at all times, as well as how you will be able to help us.

http://www.facebook.com/DavidChrisChris

 

  - Tumblr: This is the core of everything to come. tumblr is where we will create the new story from now, until the end of our journey, this is our personal online diary. Everything that is created here will also be linked to all our other pages, but if you want the real detail of everything we have to say and show, you come to us here.

http://davidchrischris.tumblr.com


  - Twitter: Here you can quickly follow what we are doing, and what our next steps are going to be. We will mainly use twitter as well during the actual adventure in Mexico, to keep you updated with short messages, in places where communication is limited.

https://twitter.com/#!/DC2Adv


  - Vimeo and YouTube: Our video channels.

https://vimeo.com/channels/310023

http://www.youtube.com/user/davidchrischris
 

Sub-Total: Free 

 

 

2. 3G & Geo-tracking.

This will enable us to update you in the moment, whilst in Mexico. We want to be able to tell you in real time, where we are, what we are doing, and what we are going to do, as well as the decisions we will need you to make as a crowd.

Of course in order for us to be able to share our experience in this way, we will need a device that is capable of doing all of this. A smartphone being the obvious choice, will help us setup our tracking and sharing system, so that we can be continuously in contact with you, wherever we are.

Sub-Total: $500

 

 

3. Recording Equipment.

In order for us to be able to record on the move, everywhere we go, and give you the best audible experience possible, we will need a few instruments to help us make this possible.

Since we are going to be recording in outdoor remote areas such as caves, forests, mountains and other interesting places, we are going to need a light, portable and quality recording rig.

Sub-Total: $1,800 

 

 

4. Cinematography & Photography Equipment.

The visual aspect of the adventure is also just as important to us as the actual recording of the audio. They both play huge roles in being able to produce the most genuine recreation of this road trip.

This, just like the audio equipment has its specific needs in order to be able to withstand the kind of places we will be visiting and at the same time produce the quality we require.

Sub-Total: $5,900

 

 

5. Travel Equipment.

We will need certain equipment in order for us to cope with non-industrialized areas, especially when we are recording, filming or out camping in the wild. This way we can keep our instruments running even if we do not have any power available once they have run out.

We will also need a few things for ourselves, like sleeping gear, travel gear, and protective gear for us as well as our equipment, so that nothing gets damaged, and well, so we can keep ourselves out of harms way.

Sub-Total: $1,300

 

 

6. Miscellaneous Items.

Other items will also be required in order for the trip to go smoothly, that way we will not risk delaying the adventure with possible problems that can be easily avoided.

Things like fuel, spare tires, plane tickets and traveling through toll gates are all things we need to take into account, to make the trip more feasible.

Sub-Total: $7,500


_________________

Total Cost: $17,000

Indiegogo % Charge: $1,000 (7% Approx.)


Total Required Budget: $18,000

For more detailed  information download the "DC2 Budget" sheet at the top of the page in the "Gallery" tab


The Trip Will Happen

Regardless of whether we reach our target budget or not, we are still going to do everything in our power, to make the adventure as successful as possible. We will still try and release everything that we can with what we have.

Of course if we do reach our target, it will help us assure you that our full production will be released, and that we can give the most authentic recreation of this beautiful adventure we hope to share with you.

Through being able to fulfill this journey, we will finally be able to share with you our finished recordings of the story you helped create.

 

The Album

DC² - Our Memoir

1. Music Album
2. Music Video Album
3. Video Documentary
4. Photo Album
5. Written Story

 

A Stop Of Importance

The digital world offers a new way to communicate ourselves at a global scale. Not only does it help us share our ideas to all of you, but it also lets us get in contact with everyone that shares what we believe in.

Unfortunately not everyone is able to take advantage of such an opportunity.

One of our final stops on the adventure will be in Cuernavaca, near the town of Tepoztlan, where we will spend the day with a foundation for children without parents.  Many of them have lost a big part of their childhood, due to a clouded past and the emotional scars they hold.  

We want to help them find and ignite their own passion, and hopefully motivate them to follow their own dreams and live a fulfilling life.  

They will be the first ones to hear our music live and we are going to have them participate in one of our songs, in order to bring light and awareness to the matter.

Additionally, we are going to be doing a fundraiser for them during our trip.  More information on how you can help these children will be revealed as we get closer to the start of our adventure.

 

 

 

 

___________________________________________________________________________

 

 

 

Versión Español

“Creemos en la búsqueda de nuestros sueños, y esperamos que en el camino, te inspirarás a hacer lo mismo."


Nuestra Historia


DC²

Creemos que cada uno de nosotros está aquí para perseguir las cosas que soñamos y anhelamos, pero aveces es difícil de encontrar apoyo o estímulo en nuestro mundo moderno.  Esperamos que si perseguimos nuestros sueños, y compartimos cada paso de ese viaje con todos ustedes, tal vez los podremos inspirarlos para seguir el suyo propio. Y tal vez todos podemos hacer de nuestro mundo un mejor lugar.

Somos 3 amigos, reunidos por nuestro amor por la música, tomando un camino hacia el sueño que compartimos.

Estudiamos juntos, y fue entonces, que empezamos a tocar música.

David, Chris y Chris. Nuestros nombres se convirtieron en nuestra identidad musical: DC²

Nuestro vínculo. La química creada a través de tocar la guitarra juntos.

Nuestra meta. Crear nuestra música y compartirla con ustedes.

Nuestro propósito. Seguir nuestros corazones y mostrarles que ustedes también pueden hacerlo.

Los invitamos a que nos acompañen y sean parte de esta aventura y que se inspiren a seguir sus propios sueños.
 
 

El Impacto

Estamos creando un album.

En la actualidad, nosotros estamos repartidos por todo el mundo. Uno de nosotros vive en México (David), otro en Dubai (Chris Tombrink) y otro en Singapur (Chris Thyssen).

Sin embargo, nuestro vínculo para tocar la guitarra juntos, nos ha ayudado a tomar la decisión de reunirnos para hacer algo que permanecer con nosotros por el resto de nuestras vidas.

La variedad y riqueza de las oportunidades disponibles para la gente de hoy, está permitiendo a cada uno de nosotros contar nuestras historias de la manera que resulta más natural. Hemos decidido hacer algo que no sólo será una experiencia auditiva, sino una visual y escrita también.

Esperamos que mediante la combinación de estos diferentes medios de contar historias, te podamos llevar en este viaje, y que ustedes puedan ser parte de escribir esta historia con nosotros.

Nuestra aventura se llevará a cabo en México. Viajaremos de Cancún a Tepoztlán, a partir del 20 de Junio 2012.

Con 12 destinaciones generales para descubrir y una ruta de mas de 2.000 kilómetros de viaje, habrá muchas experiencias y desafíos inesperados en el camino.

Queremos que usted participe en nuestro viaje con la esperanza de inspirar a seguir su camino propio, cual sea su dirección.

Hemos decidido hacer esto de la única manera que es natural para nosotros, y es por la que los invitamos a ser parte de lo que esperamos sea el comienzo del resto de nuestras vidas. Y tal vez el camino que tomemos los ayudara a encontrar su propio, el camino menos viajado, hacia todo lo que se puedan imaginar.

 

Lo Que Necesitamos Y Lo Que Te Damos

El álbum que queremos grabar es uno que involucrara a ti, desde el principio del viaje, hasta su producción y estreno del proyecto final.  Para que puedas seguirnos durante todo el proceso, vamos a necesitar herramientas que nos permitirán mantenernos en contacto mutuo.

 

1. Medios de Communicacion Social por Internet.

  - Facebook: La página principal donde necesitaremos su participación interactiva. Es aquí donde los mantendremos al día de lo que estamos haciendo, para que nos puedan ayudar en todos los aspectos de la aventura.  Adicionalmente, aqui podran ver nuestra línea de tiempo, desde la fundación de DC² a principios de 2007, hasta ahora y todo lo que está por venir, incluyendo vídeos de nuestras presentaciones pasadas y una biblioteca llena de fotos.

http://www.facebook.com/DavidChrisChris

 

 - Tumblr: Este es el núcleo de todo por venir. Tumblr es donde vamos a crear la historia a partir de ahora, hasta el final de nuestro viaje.  Este es nuestro diario personal en el Internet. Todo lo que se crea aquí también se vinculará a todas nuestras páginas adicionales, pero si desean ver en detalle todo lo que queremos decir y mostrar, Tumblr es la pagina mas completa.

http://davidchrischris.tumblr.com


  - Twitter: Aquí usted puede seguir lo que estamos haciendo “en el momento”, y lo que nuestros próximos pasos van a ser. Principalmente se utilizara Twitter durante la aventura, para mantenerlos actualizados con mensajes cortos, en los lugares donde la comunicación es limitada.

https://twitter.com/#!/DC2Adv
 

- Vimeo y YouTube: Nuestros canales de vídeos.

https://vimeo.com/channels/310023

http://www.youtube.com/user/davidchrischris



Sub-Total: Gratis


2. Conneccion de internet mobil.

Esto nos permitirá actualizarlos a cualquier hora, durante nuestro viaje en México. Queremos ser capaces de decirles en real-time, dónde estamos, qué estamos haciendo, y lo que vamos a hacer, así como las decisiones que queremos que tomen ustedes, la gente.

Con el fin de que seamos capaces de compartir nuestra experiencia en este camino, vamos a necesitar un dispositivo que pueda hacer todo esto. Un “smartphone” es la opción obvia, ya que nos ayudará a configurar nuestro sistema de seguimiento y participación.

Sub-Total: $500


3. Equipo de grabación.

Para poder grabar en el camino, donde quiera que vallamos, y darles la mejor experiencia auditiva posible, vamos a necesitar unos pocos instrumentos que nos ayuden a que esto sea posible.

Puesto que vamos a estar grabando al aire libre en zonas remotas, tales como cuevas, bosques, montañas y otros lugares interesantes, vamos a necesitar un equipo de grabación ligero, portátil y de calidad.


Sub-Total: $1,800


4. Equipo de Cinematografía y Fotográfico.

El aspecto visual de la aventura es tan importante para nosotros como la grabación del audio. Ambos juegan un papel enorme en ser capaces de producir la recreación más genuina de esta aventura.

Esto, al igual que el equipo de audio tiene sus necesidades específicas a fin de ser capaces de soportar el tipo de lugares que vamos a visitar y al mismo tiempo producir la calidad que requerimos.

Sub-Total: $5,900


5. Equipo de Viaje.

Vamos a necesitar cierto equipo de viaje para que podamos enfrentar las zonas no civilizadas, sobre todo cuando estemos grabando, filmando o acampando en la naturaleza. De esta manera podemos mantener nuestros instrumentos electrónicos funcionando, y tener respaldo en caso de necesidad.

También vamos a necesitar sleeping bags y casa de campana, equipo de viaje, equipo protectivo para mantenernos seguros y fundas de protección para nuestros instrumentos, para mantener todo protegido.

Sub-Total: $1,300


6. Otros Elementos.

Otras cosas adicionales se requieren.  Algunas, en especial, para prevenir situaciones desafortunadas durante el viaje.  De esta manera, hay mejor posibilidad de que el viaje sea sin interrupciones.

Necesidades como gasolina, llantas nuevas, billetes de avión y casetas de cobro son solo algunas de estas cosas que tenemos que tener en cuenta.

Sub-Total: $7,500


_________________

Costo Total: $17,000

Indiegogo tarificacion % de los costes: $1,000 (7% Approx.)


Presupuesto Requerido Total: $18,000 

Para más información descargar el "Budget DC2" hoja en la parte superior de la página en la "Gallery" ficha.


El Viaje Sera

Independientemente de que si llegamos a nuestro presupuesto o no, vamos a hacer todo lo que esté a nuestro alcance, para que la aventura sea lo más exitosa posible y para que nuestra producción sea la mas completa.

Sin embargo, si llegamos a nuestro presupuesto, nos ayudará a asegurar que podremos darles a ustedes la recreación más auténtica de esta hermosa aventura que esperamos darles.

Al cumplir esta aventura, podremos finalmente compartir con ustedes nuestro producto final, y una historia que ustedes ayudaron a crear.


El Album

DC ² - Nuestra Memoria

1. Music Album
2. Music Video Album
3. Video Documental
4. Álbum de fotos
5. Artículo escrito

 

Una Parada De Importancia

El mundo digital ofrece una nueva manera para que nos comuniquemos a una escala global. No sólo nos ayuda a compartir nuestras ideas con todos ustedes, sino que también nos permite entrar en contacto con todo el mundo que comparte lo que creemos.

Desafortunadamente no todo el mundo es capaz de tomar ventaja de esta oportunidad.

Una de nuestras paradas finales en la aventura será en Cuernavaca, cerca de Tepoztlán, donde pasaremos el día con una fundación para niños sin padres. Muchos de ellos han perdido una gran parte de su infancia, debido a un pasado turbio y las cicatrices emocionales que poseen.

Queremos ayudarles a encontrar y encender su propia pasión, y esperamos motivarlos a seguir sus propios sueños y vivir una vida plena.

Ellos serán los primeros en escuchar nuestra música en vivo y queremos que participen en una de nuestras canciones, para llevar a luz a la materia.
Además, vamos a juntar fondos para ellos durante nuestro viaje. Más información sobre cómo podrán ayudar a estos niños será revelada conforme nos acerquemos al inicio de nuestra aventura.

Versión Español hacia abajo
 
English Version
Our Story

DC² 
We believe that each of us is here to pursue the things we dream of and long for, but that often it is hard to find support or encouragement in our modern world. We hope that if we pursue our dreams, and share every step of that journey with all of you, maybe we can inspire you to follow your own. And maybe we can all make the world a little bit better. We are 3 friends, reunited by our love for music, taking a journey towards the dream we share. We went to high school together, and it was then, that we started playing music as a group.David, Chris and Chris. Our real names became our musical identity: DC² Our bond. The chemistry created through playing guitar together. Our goal. Create our music and share it with you. Our purpose. To follow our hearts and show you that you can too. We invite you to come along and be part of this adventure, to inspire you to follow your own dreams.

Sub-Total: Free 
 
 
2. 3G & Geo-tracking.

A smartphone being the obvious choice, will help us setup our tracking and sharing system, so that we can be continuously in contact with you, wherever we are.

3. Recording Equipment.
In order for us to be able to record on the move, everywhere we go, and give you the best audible experience possible, we will need a few instruments to help us make this possible.
Since we are going to be recording in outdoor remote areas such as caves, forests, mountains and other interesting places, we are going to need a light, portable and quality recording rig.

http://davidchrischris.tumblr.com
  - Twitter: Aquí usted puede seguir lo que estamos haciendo “en el momento”, y lo que nuestros próximos pasos van a ser. Principalmente se utilizara Twitter durante la aventura, para mantenerlos actualizados con mensajes cortos, en los lugares donde la comunicación es limitada.
https://twitter.com/#!/DC2Adv - Vimeo y YouTube: Nuestros canales de vídeos.
https://vimeo.com/channels/310023
http://www.youtube.com/user/davidchrischris
Sub-Total: Gratis

2. Conneccion de internet mobil.
Esto nos permitirá actualizarlos a cualquier hora, durante nuestro viaje en México. Queremos ser capaces de decirles en real-time, dónde estamos, qué estamos haciendo, y lo que vamos a hacer, así como las decisiones que queremos que tomen ustedes, la gente.Con el fin de que seamos capaces de compartir nuestra experiencia en este camino, vamos a necesitar un dispositivo que pueda hacer todo esto. Un “smartphone” es la opción obvia, ya que nos ayudará a configurar nuestro sistema de seguimiento y participación.Sub-Total: $500

3. Equipo de grabación.
Para poder grabar en el camino, donde quiera que vallamos, y darles la mejor experiencia auditiva posible, vamos a necesitar unos pocos instrumentos que nos ayuden a que esto sea posible.
Puesto que vamos a estar grabando al aire libre en zonas remotas, tales como cuevas, bosques, montañas y otros lugares interesantes, vamos a necesitar un equipo de grabación ligero, portátil y de calidad.
Sub-Total: $1,800

4. Equipo de Cinematografía y Fotográfico.
El aspecto visual de la aventura es tan importante para nosotros como la grabación del audio. Ambos juegan un papel enorme en ser capaces de producir la recreación más genuina de esta aventura.Esto, al igual que el equipo de audio tiene sus necesidades específicas a fin de ser capaces de soportar el tipo de lugares que vamos a visitar y al mismo tiempo producir la calidad que requerimos.Sub-Total: $5,900

5. Equipo de Viaje.
Vamos a necesitar cierto equipo de viaje para que podamos enfrentar las zonas no civilizadas, sobre todo cuando estemos grabando, filmando o acampando en la naturaleza. De esta manera podemos mantener nuestros instrumentos electrónicos funcionando, y tener respaldo en caso de necesidad.También vamos a necesitar sleeping bags y casa de campana, equipo de viaje, equipo protectivo para mantenernos seguros y fundas de protección para nuestros instrumentos, para mantener todo protegido.Sub-Total: $1,300

6. Otros Elementos.
Otras cosas adicionales se requieren.  Algunas, en especial, para prevenir situaciones desafortunadas durante el viaje.  De esta manera, hay mejor posibilidad de que el viaje sea sin interrupciones.
Necesidades como gasolina, llantas nuevas, billetes de avión y casetas de cobro son solo algunas de estas cosas que tenemos que tener en cuenta.Sub-Total: $7,500

_________________
Costo Total: $17,000
Indiegogo tarificacion % de los costes: $1,000 (7% Approx.)

Presupuesto Requerido Total: $18,000 
Para más información descargar el "Budget DC2" hoja en la parte superior de la página en la "Gallery" ficha.

El Viaje Sera
Independientemente de que si llegamos a nuestro presupuesto o no, vamos a hacer todo lo que esté a nuestro alcance, para que la aventura sea lo más exitosa posible y para que nuestra producción sea la mas completa.Sin embargo, si llegamos a nuestro presupuesto, nos ayudará a asegurar que podremos darles a ustedes la recreación más auténtica de esta hermosa aventura que esperamos darles.Al cumplir esta aventura, podremos finalmente compartir con ustedes nuestro producto final, y una historia que ustedes ayudaron a crear.

El Album
DC ² - Nuestra Memoria1. Music Album2. Music Video Album3. Video Documental4. Álbum de fotos5. Artículo escrito
 
Una Parada De Importancia
El mundo digital ofrece una nueva manera para que nos comuniquemos a una escala global. No sólo nos ayuda a compartir nuestras ideas con todos ustedes, sino que también nos permite entrar en contacto con todo el mundo que comparte lo que creemos.Desafortunadamente no todo el mundo es capaz de tomar ventaja de esta oportunidad.Una de nuestras paradas finales en la aventura será en Cuernavaca, cerca de Tepoztlán, donde pasaremos el día con una fundación para niños sin padres. Muchos de ellos han perdido una gran parte de su infancia, debido a un pasado turbio y las cicatrices emocionales que poseen.Queremos ayudarles a encontrar y encender su propia pasión, y esperamos motivarlos a seguir sus propios sueños y vivir una vida plena.Ellos serán los primeros en escuchar nuestra música en vivo y queremos que participen en una de nuestras canciones, para llevar a luz a la materia.Además, vamos a juntar fondos para ellos durante nuestro viaje. Más información sobre cómo podrán ayudar a estos niños será revelada conforme nos acerquemos al inicio de nuestra aventura.

story:
*UPDATE XL shirts now available

we are now accepting XL shirt orders! Don't pay attention to the perk description, we have XL tees.  Indiegogo wont let us edit that section because the fundraiser has launched already. Once you buy a shirt we'll send you a message to ask you what design you want and what size shirt you need. 

 

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

What is Forward Ohio?

 

Forward Ohio is a yearly DIY punk music festival that has taken place in various locations in Ohio.
Along with offering all ages music, workshops and zine/book distros, Forward Ohio raises money for local non-profits in each host city.

Forward Ohio 2013

This year Forward Ohio will take place in Columbus, Ohio April 26th and 27th.

Along with providing a fest that is free of corporate sponsorship, we book this fest with a focus on creating an environment that is free of racist, sexist, homophobic and transphobic behavior. 

GIVING BACK:the real punk

With this fundraiser FO is looking to raise some money for the Columbus food pantry.  We are doing that by offering you 5 amazing fest shirts.  100% of the profits we make from this fundraiser goes to the pantry. 

This isn't charity or throwing money at a problem so you don't have to think about it anymore. It's about saying that as a community, DIY punk culture is about more than just music. 

 

What We Need & What You Get

It's simple, buy a sweet shirt and support your local community at the same time! 5 of our friends have made fest shirt designs and they are all amazing, check them out!

Why Funds Are Needed

-Ohio Ranks at #6 in the country for food insecurity and hunger.

-1 out of six Ohio families struggles with food insecurity.

story:
"This is one of the most beautiful things

to happen to me in a long time."  

                                            — Karrishma, Vak Choir Member   

WHAT IS VAK?

Vak is the ancient Indian Goddess who brings the world into being through sound. We are the Vak Choir, inspired by the idea of Vak, and the vivifying power of voice and listening. We practice ancient yogic sound techniques that we've discovered bring great benefits to our modern lives. And we've been asked to perform at the Yerba Buena Center for the Arts this fall.

Six months ago Vak Choir Director and professional vocalist Ann Dyer was commissioned by the YBCA to create a full-length concert inspired by her many years of exploration of ancient Indian sound practices. Ann titled the new work Vak: Song of Becoming, and decided to build it on an enormous, sonorous foundation of vocal resonance.

And so the Vak Choir was born. 108+ "everyday" voices exploring how voice and deep listening can awaken us to different dimensions of awareness. We have quickly grown to over 150 choir members, people now passionate about their new connection to sound and self, and eager to "share the love" in performance this fall at the YBCA.

Vak does, indeed, seem to have a mighty momentum all her own. What began as a concert, quickly became a choir, and is now The Vak Project, with plans destined to outlive our premiere at the YBCA, including future performances and educational outreach programs that inspire and awaken through voice and listening.

And we need your help to move forward.

 

THE CHOIR

 

"It's actually like I'm tuning my soul!" — Scott

“I find myself singing, in the car, in the house, walking down the street, and it feels really good.  And I've never done that before.” — Cathy

“The Vak Choir is taking chanting that is sometimes done in yoga class to a new level of experience"– Brooke  

"It's as if my head has fallen into my heart." — Simmy

The Vak Choir is a diverse group of over a hundred people (and growing!) who are discovering the power and beauty of their own voice — many for the first time — through the study of yogic sound practices.  The Choir meets weekly (a session in San Francisco and another in Oakland) learning skills and understandings about sound and voice to support their upcoming YBCA performance, but more importantly, that benefit their day-to-day lives now, and for years to come.

 

 THE CONCERT 

Vak: Song of Becoming is a contemporary, interdisciplinary concert experience which explores the profound impact of sound — and particularly voice — has on our experience of being. Co-composed by Ann Dyer and Tim Volpicella, with choreography by Erika Chong Shuch, this unique work features vocalist Ann Dyer and the Vak Choir performing with a progressive ensemble of Bay Area-based musicians including bassist John Shifflet, drummer Jason Lewis featured soloist, saxophonist Hafez Modirzadeh.  The full-length concert carries the audience through a musical experience inspired by the sound meditations performed by hatha yogis of the medieval period, gradually moving from a state of everyday awareness into increasing deeper, more subtle dimensions of attention. 

Vak: Song of Becoming blurs the lines between audience and performer, time and space, ancient and contemporary, aesthetic and spiritual in a concert experience that Dyer refers to with a smile, as a "modern musical awakening.” 

THE NEED 

The YBCA has given us a generous commission to launch this project. But concert production in a state-of-the-art union facility costs more than a song. We need your help to raise the additional funds to support the artistic and healing goals of the program. Your contributions will go toward:

• summer rehearsal space large enough to accommodate over 100 people. 

• technical support for this production which requires the finest sound engineering.

• public programs in "sound and self" offerred free to the public this summer.

• artist wages for our incredibly talented Bay Area based artists.

• video documentation to help us support future Vak Choir activities.

 

 HOW YOU CAN HELP

1. Make a financial donation. All donations are tax deductible (above value of gift) AND come with generous thank you gifts we think you'll love, like free yoga classes, passes to the cast party, yoga and chanting retreats, Vak Choir-infused mala beads and more. Waive your perks to make your donation 100% tax-deductible!

2.Help spread the word. If you believe in what we’re doing, please telli your friends about this campaign. Just emailing this video to 10 friends, reposting on your Facebook page, or Tweeting about it will make a significant difference.

3. Join the Vak Choir.  If you live in the Bay Area, start enjoying the benefits of opening to your voice and deepening your sense of sound by joining the choir AND perform with us at the YBCA September! Two new sessions starting in April, one in the East Bay and the other in San Francisco. 

 

We really appreciate your support and are so excited to see what we can do together to create this inspiring concert this fall and beyond.

 

THANK YOU!  

Ann Dyer and the Vak Choir

THANK YOU!

story:
We are about to ask you for money. 

Indulge me and try to imagine us sitting opposite from you and delivering this hum-dinger of a sales pitch.

 

Hi! 

How are you? We're doing great, but we're pretty broke. That's why we need your help!

We have a new record to make, but we're pretty much cat food status poor. To make matters worse, there's only two of us, so cost per person is pretty high.

Tracking a record costs $35 per hour or about $350 per day. For five songs it costs about $1750 just to track. That doesn't include mixing, and that doesn't include pressing. Our last records cost about $2000 each without pressing.

So what it comes down to is us asking (begging) for help. 

When you construct one of these pages you really realize what your figure means. It's terrifying, and a whole world of possibilities like "what if we're asking too much," and "what if no one donates at all" run through your head. We've set a goal of $1500 because $1500 is what we need. We wouldn't feel right asking friends and fans to pay our entire way. It's ambitious, and we hope that we can raise anything close to it. Every small contribution helps, and that is no joke.

story:
Short Summary

Hey y'all. I've always distrusted and disliked this service because people just use it for charity, but I'm just using it as basically a pre-order.

If you've ever wanted some DHB vinyl then go 'head and place your order here. 

What I Need & What You Get

$20 gets you a personally addressed Campfire Sessions or Vespers vinyl.

$35 gets you both.

$50 gets you both and a song named after you on my next record

$100 gets you both and an EP named after you.

$500 I will come to where ever you are and perform in your home

$750 I will take your girlfriend/mother/sister out on a date and then call her back the next day, explaining that as much as I enjoyed myself, we just live too far apart for it to work out.

$800 I will take your girlfriend/mother/sister out on a date and have her back at a reasonable hour.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean they can’t help:

Ask yr friends to help out, put them on to my stuff and try to spread the word.

Rob a house, take their money and give it to me.

 

You're the best. Each and every one of you.

story:
Support Archie Green in releasing his new EP and 1st Official Music Video

Archie Green (aka SoulKlap) is readying the release of his latest project, The Greatest Pretender EP. This time around, he is asking for help from fans, friends and family alike to present it in a professional manner. The project has been recorded, and is now in need of post-production which consists of mixing and mastering.  Archie has also shot his very 1st official music video for the 1st single, "40 Acres," which he would like to promote with a PR firm.  The goal he has set is for $1,300.00.  He is asking for your help in achieving this goal.  Supporters of $75 or more, will get an exclusive beat produced by Archie himself!! Let's work together to help Archie Green bring CLASS to Hip-Hop!!

Allocation of Funds

  • Mixing & Mastering of The Greatest Pretender EP - $500
  • "40 Acres" Music Video Promotion Fees - $750
*The remaining amount of funds are for Indiegogo and Credit Card Processing Fees*


Who is Archie Green?

Archie Green is an independent rapper/producer hailing from Cleveland, Ohio. Recently he earned his Masters' Degree in Music Business at the illustrious New York University's Steinhardt School. He did his undergrad at Morehouse College in Atlanta, GA, but has been an artist since he was 13.  This will be Archie's 4th major project release.

Archie Green: The Rapper

As an artist, Archie has released three critically praised solo projects (under his former pseudonym, SoulKlap).  When Archie debuted, he was lauded by some as an "unsigned Kanye West,"  with soul-infused production and conscious raps.  In 2010, his song "iOweYou," was selected and featured on Grammy-nominated rapper Talib Kweli's, Year of the Blacksmith Community Mixtape. He has performed in various venues in Cleveland, New York as well as Atlanta.

Archie Green: The Producer

Archie has been writing and producing music independently for over a decade. As a producer (formerly known as SoulKlap), he has worked with famed mixtape DJs Mick Boogie and Terry Urban on a number of releases dating back to 2010.  Archie has also placed ad work with Converse.

Archie currently serves as a music producer for the VICE Magazine sponsored web show, "NOISEY RAPS!" which features interviews with some of today's hottest up and coming rappers in hip-hop (including A$AP Rocky, Danny Brown, ScHoolboy Q, Gucci Mane, Waka Flocka Flame & more).

CLASS is the Life

Archie's lyrical content gives a different perspective than most popular rappers of today. As an African-American raised in upper-middle class suburbia, Archie tells stories of being the "token black kid" growing up as well as being blessed to have two parents at home that more than provided for him growing up.  These topics are components of Archie's brand and lifestyle called CLASS. CLASS stands for: Creatively Learning to Achieve Sustainable Success.  He attributes much of his brand from his childhood, matriculation at Morehouse College, and life lessons passed down from generations in his family.  The key elements of CLASS are presentation (appearance, dress), professionalism (business sense), respect for elders and self, and faith in self & faith in God. 

With your contributions, you are helping Archie to achieve his overall goal of sharing his music with the world the way it was intended to be shared.  With CLASS!
story_txt:
Support Archie Green in releasing his new EP and 1st Official Music Video

Archie Green (aka SoulKlap) is readying the release of his latest project, The Greatest Pretender EP. This time around, he is asking for help from fans, friends and family alike to present it in a professional manner. The project has been recorded, and is now in need of post-production which consists of mixing and mastering.  Archie has also shot his very 1st official music video for the 1st single, "40 Acres," which he would like to promote with a PR firm.  The goal he has set is for $1,300.00.  He is asking for your help in achieving this goal.  Supporters of $75 or more, will get an exclusive beat produced by Archie himself!! Let's work together to help Archie Green bring CLASS to Hip-Hop!!
Allocation of Funds



Mixing & Mastering of The Greatest Pretender EP - $500

"40 Acres" Music Video Promotion Fees - $750

*The remaining amount of funds are for Indiegogo and Credit Card Processing Fees*
Who is Archie Green?
Archie Green is an independent rapper/producer hailing from Cleveland, Ohio. Recently he earned his Masters' Degree in Music Business at the illustrious New York University's Steinhardt School. He did his undergrad at Morehouse College in Atlanta, GA, but has been an artist since he was 13.  This will be Archie's 4th major project release.

Archie Green: The Rapper
As an artist, Archie has released three critically praised solo projects (under his former pseudonym, SoulKlap).  When Archie debuted, he was lauded by some as an "unsigned Kanye West,"  with soul-infused production and conscious raps.  In 2010, his song "iOweYou," was selected and featured on Grammy-nominated rapper Talib Kweli's, Year of the Blacksmith Community Mixtape. He has performed in various venues in Cleveland, New York as well as Atlanta.


Archie Green: The Producer
Archie has been writing and producing music independently for over a decade. As a producer (formerly known as SoulKlap), he has worked with famed mixtape DJs Mick Boogie and Terry Urban on a number of releases dating back to 2010.  Archie has also placed ad work with Converse.
Archie currently serves as a music producer for the VICE Magazine sponsored web show, "NOISEY RAPS!" which features interviews with some of today's hottest up and coming rappers in hip-hop (including A$AP Rocky, Danny Brown, ScHoolboy Q, Gucci Mane, Waka Flocka Flame & more).



CLASS is the Life
Archie's lyrical content gives a different perspective than most popular rappers of today. As an African-American raised in upper-middle class suburbia, Archie tells stories of being the "token black kid" growing up as well as being blessed to have two parents at home that more than provided for him growing up.  These topics are components of Archie's brand and lifestyle called CLASS. CLASS stands for: Creatively Learning to Achieve Sustainable Success.  He attributes much of his brand from his childhood, matriculation at Morehouse College, and life lessons passed down from generations in his family.  The key elements of CLASS are presentation (appearance, dress), professionalism (business sense), respect for elders and self, and faith in self & faith in God. 



With your contributions, you are helping Archie to achieve his overall goal of sharing his music with the world the way it was intended to be shared.  With CLASS!

story:
Short Summary

It's hard for any DIY musician to get their passion and hard work distributed, let alone by themselves. But in this day in age, with technology the majority of people have (the internet), it can be done with the help of people like you. With your help, not only do you help provide a way for people like myself get their passion out, but you'll also be rewarded for your help.

With your donations, I will be able to get my second album, 'Asthmatic Lizard,' the second of half of my musical concept, out to a larger group of people. With your help, not only will another DIY musician get their music known, the listeners will also be exposed to another creative musician, hopefully getting them to get a better understanding for experimental music.

What I Need & What You Get

I need just a small amount of money to get my music on CD, cassette (with a digital download), and to pay for it to be put on Amazon MP3, iTunes, Spotify, etc. There will be 100 cassettes where some will be sold in local stores and some sold online.

If you help, you will get many good things as a thank you from myself, as well as the satisfaction of giving a helping hand to a DIY musician.

The Impact

With your help, not only will my passion and hard work get to more people, but those more people will also be able to hear music that they otherwise wouldn't have been able to. In today's age of music, it is good for everyone to hear more than what's just popular for them to expand their musical listening to something creative and experimental.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are in a financial situation that doesn't allow you to donate, you can still help greatly by spreading the word online and to your friends. Much like how any dollar count, any word counts and is just as appreciated and respected.

story:
ILX Funding 2016

Since 2006 ILX has been self-funding. Since 2013 we've been totally ad-supported, but ad income is down and it's time to pass the hat again.

What We Need & What You Get

To pay server bills for the coming year, we need ~£1450, so that's our target. There's still some ad money coming in, so whatever arrives we'll use to stretch out the pot for as long as possible.

What you get: ILX, for all your typing-at-people needs.

story:
Bienvenue!

Nous avons financé et réalisé l'enregistrement de notre premier album en janvier 2015. Nous avons maintenant besoin de soutien pour en  concrétiser la conception et la fabrication, pour une sortie prévue en septembre 2015.

Musique improvisée, musique jazz, traditionnelle et contemporaine, musique de transe et orchestrale, musique de rage et de lutte, de mystère et de rêve, Healing Orchestra veut célébrer et poursuivre l’histoire des musiques créatives et populaires, rendre hommage à  nos luttes et à nos vies

Healing Orchestra home Page

The Healing Orchestra has recently recorded its first album in january 2015. We now need support to pay the making of the album, and be able to release it in september 2015.
Through Jazz and improvised Music, traditionnal and contemporary Music, Orchestral Music of trance, of rage and struggle, of dreams and mystery,
Healing Orchestra celebrates and follows up the legacy of popular and creative Musics and pays tribute to our struggles and our lives.

Healing Orchestra

 

Paul Wacrenier :Piano, Vibraphone, Compositions, Arrangement, Direction    Xavier Bornens : trompette, mélophone ; Leo Jeannet : trompette                   Arnaud Sacase : Saxophone Alto/Clarinette Basse                                     Jean-François Petitjean : Saxophones Tenor et Soprano                                              Jon Vicuna : Saxophone Baryton ; Mauro Basilio : violoncelle                         Yoram Rosilio : Contrebasse ; Benoist Raffin : Batterie                                                   Sven Clerx : Percussions

présentation

En réunissant de nombreux musiciens de jazz et d'avant garde, Healing Orchestra est conçu comme un forum permettant de faire vivre une musique forte et généreuse, ancrée dans la grande tradition du free jazz et de la Great Black Music . Dans la lignée du workshop de Charles Mingus, du Little Huey Orchestra de William Parker, ou encore du Akosh S Unit, l’orchestre réussit la symbiose entre une écriture fine et l’improvisation libre, entre le free jazz et les musiques traditionnelles.

Healing Orchestra s’approprie une philosophie et les idées suivantes : La liberté totale dans l’usage des techniques de jeu, d’écriture, d’improvisation, au service de la musique. Un son collectif vivant et organique, construit par les initiatives et personnalités de chaque individu. Enfin une vision de la musique, de l’art et de la culture ,au-delà des querelles entre avant-garde et tradition, qui lui donne avant tout une ambition sociale, émancipatrice et forcément révolutionnaire.

Cette musique a murit pendant de nombreuses années grâce à l’énergie, aux idées, à la générosité d’un très grand nombre de musiciens qui l’ont joué, exploré, développé ensemble, Le plus souvent dans des conditions matérielles très limitées. C’est une œuvre collective et engagée, dans la musique, dans le temps, et je l’espère porteuse d’une révolte créatrice et pleine d’enthousiasme.

Ce long et patient travail a permis à cette formation de se hisser au rang des grands orchestres de Free jazz et de musiques créatives. Votre contribution permettra d'aider à la diffusion de cette musique, qui mêle une écriture généreuse à l'énergie d'interprètes et d'improvisateurs aux belles personnalités,  et pensée pour être partagée avec tous.


L'aide que nous sollicitons

Après l'enregistrement de ce premier album, en janvier 2015, nous demandons une aide de 2000 euros pour sa conception et sa fabrication.

We Need 2000 euros to pay the making of our first Album. Extra contributions are welcome as they will help us to reimburse the price of the recording.

Si nous récoltons plus de 2000 euros, les dons en excès nous permettront de rétribuer les nombreuses personnes qui offrent de leur temps et de leur talent pour la conception de l'album, et éventuellement de nous rembourser les sommes avancées lors de l'enregistrement.

  • Chaque contributeur, quelque soit le montant de son aide,  recevra un exemplaire de notre disque dés sa sortie.
  • Each Contributor, whatever the amount of its contribution, will receive an Album after its released.

Vous ne pouvez pas contribuer pour le moment ?

Vous pouvez nous aider en faisant passer les informations concernant cette campagne à vos contacts, vos amis, à qui vous voulez faire découvrir notre musique.

Pour en savoir plus sur le Healing Orchestra :

et écouter plus d'extraits de notre musique:

http://www.paulwacrenier.com/healingorchestra.html

story:
Hello and Welcome to our Indiegogo page!

The UMass Trumpet Ensemble is raising funds to compete in the semi-final round of the National Trumpet Competition! After placing fourth in last year's competition, we are eager to return. We are also proud to announce that two of our graduate students, Austin Boyer and Emily Korth, will be competing in the Graduate Solo Division! This is an incredible opportunity for us as both students and emerging professionals. While one of our goals is to do as well as possible in competition, our main mission is to elevate the recognition of the UMass Music Department to the national level.

As you can imagine, an opportunity like this comes with (perhaps more than) its fair share of expenses! Between transportation, lodging, registration and accompanist fees, plus all other day-to-day expenses, our total costs add up to $3,700. So while our fundraising goal is $1,250, any above-and-beyond donations will still be put toward funding this experience!

Please do not hesitate to contact us for more information!

For more information on this unique opportunity, check out the National Trumpet Competition website.

http://www.nationaltrumpetcomp.org

Thank you very much for your contribution and have a great day!

Sincerely,

Adam Mejaour, Sean Elligers, Nairam Simoes, Doug Amos, Dan Fleury, Joey Goguen, Austin Boyer, and Emily Korth

story:
Si ya has visto el video de arriba... Ya sabes del proyecto... pero deaja que te de más detalle!
If you've watched the video above... U already know about the project...but let me give U more detail!
Escucha el teaser del proyecto
Take a hit and listen to the Teaser

Qué y por qué…

Bienvenido al espacio crowdfunding de Drumani.  Estoy emocionado y excitado de poner en marcha esta campaña de recaudación de fondos con el fin de generar los fondos mínimos necesarios para mi primera grabación en vinilo (sí vinilo!).

Mi último disco apareció allá por 2004.  Así que, ¿por qué no he publicado tras la buena recepción de ese primer disco? qué pasó desde entonces? La p… crisis! Sobreviví estos duros años trabajando duro a cambio de poco sueldo. Pero por fin he encontrado una mejor solución: buscar refugio en mi música ahora evolucionada a un Triphop instrumental en la búsqueda de un sonido clásico y vintage... ahí el motivo de la edición del álbum en vinilo para acentuar la dimensión que este sonido precisa!

Escucha el Teaser


Así que aquí estoy con renovada energía y entusiasmo en la preparación de esta campaña para los fondos necesarios para hacer realidad mis sueños… con un poquito de vuestra ayuda.  Gracias de antemano a los que acabéis colaborando en mi proyecto... significa mucho para mí.

Aquí puede escuchar algunos descartes y pistas sin masterizar!

Lo que necesito y lo que tendréis a cambio…

Algunos de ustedes tal vez se sorprendan al descubrir cuánto cuesta hacer una grabación de vinilo.  Los costos de la contratación de un buen ingeniero de sonido, la fabricación y edición del vinilo en sí y, finalmente, la distribución a productores y radios de todo el mundo para su promoción... todo esto suma muy rápidamente.

El feedback que recibí de muchos ingenieros de sonido que escucharon parte del proyecto me emocionó y animó a seguir, pero... tengo que decirlo: Kelly Hibbert se comprometió a ser mi ingeniero!!.   Vaya, un tipo que ha trabajado con Flying Lotus, J Dilla, Madlib, Guilty Simpson y Freddie Gibbs, entre otros muchos de su “especie”.  Artistas a los que admiro muchísimo.  Ahora es mi oportunidad de hacer algo que me apasiona con... alguien tan profesional.  ¡Qué Suerte la mía!.

Considerando lo importante que es mantener la tradición del trabajo en sonido en una sociedad en que los aparatos de alta tecnología hacen las cosas más fáciles, profesionales como Kelly Hibbert pueden marcar la diferencia.  Estoy seguro de que si me ayudas conseguiremos un producto muy especial!  Gracias por el apoyo!

Ustedes, mis seguidores, merecen transparencia.  Las cantidades a continuación ilustran el presupuesto proyectado y muestran cómo se gastará el dinero que espero recaudar.

Fabricación de vinilo    €1,560   /   $1,740

Ingeniero de sonido (edición)     €2,824   /   $3,150

Fabricación del CD     €450   /   $502

Camisetas     €350   /   $390

Servicios postales a radios y productores     €480   /   $535

Total    €5,664   /   $6,317


Take a hit and listen to the Teaser

Welcome and why!


Welcome to Drumani’s crowdfunding site. I`m so excited to launch this fundraising campaign in order to generate the minimum funds needed for my first vinyl recording (yes vinyl!).
Take a hit and listen to the Teaser

My last edited cd was in 2004 (here you can have a taste of it). So, why haven’t I published after a good reception of that first album? what happened since? Recession happened!  Surviving by working hard for low income. But finally I have found the best solution: to seek refuge in my music now evolved to instrumental abstract Triphop in a chase for a vintage sound… therefore the reason for the vinyl editing of this killer sound I’ve got!

So here I am with renewed energy and enthusiastically preparing this fundraising to make dreams come true with a little of your help.  Thx in advance if u end by collaborating on my project… that means a lot to me.

Some of you might be surprised to find out how much it costs to make a vinyl recording. The costs of hiring a good sound engineer, the edit manufacturing and finally marketing the music around the world for producers and radios… all these add up very quickly. 

                                   

 The feedback I got from many sound engineers who listened to what I do thrilled me, but… I gotta say it: Kelly Hibbert pledged to be my engineer.  Wow, a guy who worked with Flying Lotus, J Dilla, Madlib, Guilty Simpson and Freddie Gibbs among many more of a kind.  Considering that is important to maintain sound working tradition in a society where hi tech gadgets make things easier, professionals like Kelly Hibbert can make the difference.  I’m certain that if you help me, it will result in a very special product!  Thx for the support!

You, my supporters, deserve transparency. The amounts below illustrate my projected budget, showing how the money I hope to raise will be spent. 

Here U may listen to some leftovers and non-mastered tracks!

Take a hit and listen to the Teaser


What I Need & What You`ll Get

Vinyl manufacturing  €1560   /  $1740

Sound engineer (edit)     €2824  /  $3150

CD manufacturing     €450    /   $502

T-shirt     €350    /   $390

Postal services to U, radios and producers     €480    /   $535

Total  €5664   /   $6.317

My last edited cd was in 2004 (here you can have a taste of it). So, why haven’t I published after a good reception of that first album? what happened since? Recession happened!  Surviving by working hard for low income. But finally I have found the best solution: to seek refuge in my music now evolved to instrumental abstract Triphop in a chase for a vintage sound… therefore the reason for the vinyl editing of this killer sound I’ve got!
So here I am with renewed energy and enthusiastically preparing this fundraising to make dreams come true with a little of your help.  Thx in advance if u end by collaborating on my project… that means a lot to me.
Some of you might be surprised to find out how much it costs to make a vinyl recording. The costs of hiring a good sound engineer, the edit manufacturing and finally marketing the music around the world for producers and radios… all these add up very quickly. 
                                   
 The feedback I got from many sound engineers who listened to what I do thrilled me, but… I gotta say it: Kelly Hibbert pledged to be my engineer.  Wow, a guy who worked with Flying Lotus, J Dilla, Madlib, Guilty Simpson and Freddie Gibbs among many more of a kind.  Considering that is important to maintain sound working tradition in a society where hi tech gadgets make things easier, professionals like Kelly Hibbert can make the difference.  I’m certain that if you help me, it will result in a very special product!  Thx for the support!You, my supporters, deserve transparency. The amounts below illustrate my projected budget, showing how the money I hope to raise will be spent. 

Here U may listen to some leftovers and non-mastered tracks!
Take a hit and listen to the Teaser

What I Need & What You`ll Get
Vinyl manufacturing  €1560   /  $1740
Sound engineer (edit)     €2824  /  $3150
CD manufacturing     €450    /   $502
T-shirt     €350    /   $390
Postal services to U, radios and producers     €480    /   $535
Total  €5664   /   $6.317

story:
Wer ist eigentlich BENHAMMER?

Hallo, das bin ich. Ihr kennt mich vielleicht aus der deutschen Internet-und-Fotoszene, wo ich seit 2010 als Blogger und Fotograf aktiv bin. Vielleicht habt ihr schon einmal was von mir gelesen oder gesehen – vielleicht aber auch nicht. In den letzten 6 Jahren habe ich unzählige Fotografen kennenlernen dürfen, viele Fotografen auf meinem Blog mit ihrer Arbeit vorgestellt und selber den Weg in die Fotografie gefunden. Jetzt will ich mein erstes eigenes Buch machen. Über meine Leidenschaft zur Fotografie  und meine ganz persönliche Sicht auf meine Mitmenschen.

Und genau dafür brauche ich jetzt Eure Hilfe!

Hier findet ihr ein paar Interviews aus den letzten Jahren, die vielleicht noch ein bisschen mehr über mich und meine Arbeit erzählen. Wenn ihr mögt, lest gerne rein. 

  • Interview mit Spielfeld-Berlin
  • Interview mit Thang von Electru
  • Interview mit Compagnon
  • Feature auf Designlovr

Wie ihr mir helfen könnt?

Ganz einfach. Ich brauche Euer Geld, damit ich dieses Buch produzieren kann. SO, wie ich es mir vorstelle und ohne Kompromisse. Dafür brauche ich nach Absprache mit Layouter und Druckerei ca. 8700 Euro. Außerdem nehmen sich Steuern, Indiegogo und Paypal natürlich noch ein bisschen vom Kuchen. Je mehr Geld wir hier zusammensammeln, desto schöner und exklusiver werden wir dieses kleine Herzensprojekt gestalten und es zu etwas besonderem für jeden von Euch machen.

Und deswegen brauche ich Euer Geld. Aber ich will es nicht geschenkt haben! Nein, ich will, dass ihr versteht, warum mir dieses Buch so wichtig ist und ihr in meine Welt der Fotografie eintaucht, um danach Eure eigene Arbeit vielleicht aus einer ganz neuen Perspektive zusehen. Darum habe ich mir unzählige PERKs ausgedacht, die hoffentlich für jeden von Euch irgendeinen kleinen oder großen Mehrwert. Ganz wichtig: Sollte dieses Funding aus irgendeinem Grund nicht funktionieren – was ich natürlich nicht hoffe, weil ich irgendwie auf Euch setze – bekommt ihr alle die Kohle von Indiegogo wieder!

 

Und was ist "DAS LEBEN UND STERBEN DES BENHAMMER" jetzt?

2016 war das bisher verrückteste Jahr meines Lebens. Höhenflüge und Rückschläge folgten Woche für Woche. Vom Gründen meines eigenen Studios hier in Köln bis zur ersten Internet-Offtime in meinem bisher 25-jährigen Leben. Bis zum Rückzug in meine ländliche Heimat war alles dabei. Schon seit Beginn des Jahres quälte mich die Unzufriedenheit mit meiner eigenen Arbeit. Ich kaufte mir über Kleinanzeigen eine Olympus Mju II auf Empfehlung von geschätzten Kollegen und begann mich mit den alten Analogkameras meines verstobenen Opas zu beschäftigen. Die Mju und ein Haufen Analogfilme wurden zum ständigen Begleiter und inzwischen habe ich fast 200 Filme in diesem Jahr mit ihr gefüllt. Es sind Momentaufnahmen von Menschen, die dieses Jahr meinen Weg kreuzten.Vom ganz normalen Wahnsinn des Alltags bis zum selbstzerstörerischen Überkonsum von Alkohol und anderen Drogen. All das aufgenommen mit dieser kleinen Kamera. Zusammen mit der kompromisslosen Zerstörung meines ehemaligen Weblogs von jetzt auf gleich ist der Titel "DAS LEBEN UND STERBEN DES BENHAMMER" entstanden.

Es war meine ganz eigene Therapie mich persönlich wieder vom Onlinehype und Instagramfluten zu befreien, die die letzten 6 Jahre meines Lebens ohne Pause geprägt haben.  Stattdessen habe ich versucht einen neuen Blick auf die Fotografie zu finden und wieder mehr Zeit mit den Menschen und der Art von visueller Dokumentation zu verbringen, die mich einst so sehr fasziniert hat. 

 

Was du gibst & was du bekommst

 
  • Also ich brauche für den Druck in schöner Magazinoptik mit hochwertigem Cover ziemlich genau 7500,00 Euro dazu kommen die PAYPAL und INDIEGOGO Kosten
  • Wenn wir also mehr als die veranschlagten 8700,00 Euro zusammenbekommen, würde ich wahlweise die Seitenstärke erhöhen oder noch geileres Papier wählen.
  • Bei 9000,00 Euro würde ich an einem Sonderdruck arbeiten, um die ganze Haptik noch einmal auf ein neues Level zu heben
  • >9000,00 Euro sprengt gerade meine Vorstellungskraft, aber ich könnte mir limitierte Siebdruck-Poster für alle Supporter hier vorstellen oder aber auch eine exklusive Verpackung. Don't know. Let me know! 

In der eigenen Facebook-Gruppe und hier in der Historie halte ich Euch übrigens jederzeit auf dem Laufenden über das Projekt. Eigentlich ist alles aber so gut durchgeplant, dass es gar keine Risiken geben kann.

Und so sieht der Plan aus...

Da ich bekanntlich Optimist bin, auch wenn ich meine Zweifel nie so ganz verbergen kann, erzähle ich Euch einfach jetzt schon vom Plan.
 
  • Bis zum 31.12 fotografiere ich noch mit meiner Olympus Mju II weiter mein 2016. 
  • Im Januar gebe ich die letzten Filme in die Entwicklung bei Foto Lambertin am Dom (die entwickeln nämlich in 24h)
  • Danach geht's zu Marcus die letzten Filme digitalisieren.
  • Dann drucke ich die letzten Bilder auch noch aus und werde alle Bilder final mit Sebastian und Felix kuratieren, sodass ich Anfang Februar mit dem Inhalt fertig bin
  • Im Februar werden wir dann das Layout setzen und ich werde meine Texte und Fußnoten zum Buch verfassen
  • Im März gehen wir dann in den Druck
  • Am 14. April 2017 erscheint "THE LIFE AND DEATH OF BENHAMMER"
  • Alle von Euch, die hier supportet haben, sollen es schon am 13. April im Briefkasten haben
  • Die Releaseparty findet entweder am 13. April statt oder in der Woche nach dem 14. April. Daran arbeite ich gerade noch. 

 

Als kleine Einstimmung auf die Releaseparty gibt's hier noch mein bisheriges Lieblingsausstellungsvideo vom guten Kristof. Ihr dürft Euch also freuen! Ich glaube zusammen mit Euch könnte das Ding echt ziemlich gut werden!

 

 

Jetzt noch eine Preview? Klar!



 

 

 

 

 

Du hast irgendwie gar kein Geld und möchtest trotzdem Supporten?

 

Kein Problem. Dann freue ich mich, wenn Du einfach Deine Meinung einsetzt und im Web oder bei Freunden und Bekannten für diese Kampagne wirbst und so dieses Projekt ebenfalls realisierbar machst. Egal, ob es Tweets, Snaps, Facebook oder Blogposts sind! Alles trägt seinen Teil dazu bei und ich wäre dir ewig dankbar. Das nächste Kölsch geht dann definitiv auf mich! Zum Teilen kannst Du auch gerne die Indiegogo-Tools hier unten verwenden. 

_____________________________________________________________

Ansonsten fettes Danke für Euren Support, Eure Zeit und Eure Hilfe. Wenn es irgendwelche Fragen gibt, ich stehe per Mail unter studio@benhammer.de und in der Facebook-Gruppe jederzeit Rede und Antwort. 24/7 !

www.benhammer.de
www.instagram.com/benhammer_
www.fb.com/benhammer.blog
www.benventures.de

story:
What Going On?

Ben Asbury here, I record music under the moniker Axxa/Abraxas. Back in 2014 I released my debut LP through Brooklyn label Captured Tracks after releasing a handful of short run cassette releases. Over the last three years I have continued to write and record music but for a variety of reasons I have been unable to see the release of a sophomore effort. Thanks to a success through this indiegogo, my new album 'Family Altar' will see a proper vinyl release in Spring 2017!

"Family Altar" was recorded in various homes between summer 2015 and spring 2016 on a tascam 4 track.  Its warm, homey, lo-fi sound recalls the early Axxa/Abraxas cassette releases that were rerecorded for 2014's self-title LP, however this record is a substantial sonic improvement over those early recordings.  This album provides a bridge between the psych-pop songs found on the last LP and the more psyched out, krauty jammers that I've begun recording for the album to follow.  Recording this album was a healing process for me after I finally moved back into a normal housing situation after living between my van/a storage unit/ on friends & family's couches.  I was dealing with a lot of mental stress and anxiety.  This album helped me to come to terms with and reconcile some of my own mental traps and it stresses working to find balance in life. The idea of a family altar runs along with a concept of building a chapel for your duties, to build a sacred place around you where you can go into each situation and complete each action with sense of awe and wonder.  I am extremely excited to present this album to all of you!

To hear the first single from "Family Altar," "White Ship Pt. 1" as well as it's companion piece, please visit: www.axxaabraxas.tumblr.com

What We Need & What You Get

The goal set for this campaign is $2,200 however to do a deluxe treatment of this pressing is going to run me more along the lines of $3,000.  This includes purple vinyl housed in a full color proprinted inner sleeve inside a silkscreened and die-cut Jacket, as well as a silkscreened posted, hand numbered and limited to the folks who contribute through the indiegogo campaign.

This campaign is mostly just a preorder for the new album but there are also some extra special incentives including out of print Axxa releases, original artwork, and special limited releases.

At the $45 contribution level you can be a part of the "Lost Tracks" 3xCS subscription series, you will receive a new tape of unreleased Axxa music every month or two leading up to the release of "Family Altar" (only 20 available).  At $50 get you an original silkscreen piece from the series that was used to design the art on 2014s "Axxa/Abraxas" (your choice, but first come first serve since there are only a handful of each. Link: http://nofuturenow.tumblr.com ). $75 gets you the LP AND a test press of the LP courtesy of United Record Pressings! The $100 incentive called "From the Archive" is limited to ONE and it includes the entire Axxa/Abraxas AND AX discography. This includes the ABSOLUTE last copy of at lease 3 or 4 releases. $100 can also get you a "Family Altar" LP plus a hand painted 10" (78rpm) record made in a series limited to the number of people that claim this incentive.  For $250 you get the album plus and original art piece created just for you. At $350 you receive an LP plus a tapestry piece that includes all 26 of the silkscreen pieces in the series used to design the art of 'Axxa/Abraxas.' There are three of these total, I have one, Mike Sniper at Captured Tracks has one, and this last one that you could own was used as a window display at Wuxtry Records in Athens, GA.  Finally, for $500, you can get credited on the album as 'Exective Producer,' also includes an LP, a test pressing, and guest list passes to every Axxa/Abraxas show forever. Please contact me with any Questions/Comments/Concerns and we can work something out.

Other Ways You Can Help

I understand that money is tight.  I spent the better part of the months leading up to recording this album without a job or a stable living situation.  However with a campaign like this it is extremely important to get the word out at to as many people as possible.  There are links on this page that can be used to share this page on yr favorite social media outlets and I would GREATLY appreciate if y'all use them, whether you can contribute monetarily or not.

story:
This record was born out of a dream-long pilgrimage: through the fields of Iowa to the banks of the Mississippi. Over the sea to walk across countries. Sleeping in dimly lit hostels with new friends from all over the globe. Sitting in living rooms watching Cosmos. Slaying old monsters that you were told would devour you if you didn't live a certain way. Spilling your guts with loved ones in city apartments. Internet dating schemes gone awry. Driving through the Tobacco Roots with your dad. Stealing riffs from your favorite bands. Searching for some internal release only to be given a different answer. Finding yourself grasping and then being reminded to let go. This is Tom Hymn's Tangerine Dream.

My good droog, Jacob Bullard (Major Murphy, Antrim Dells), and I began putting these dreams-turned-to-song down on tape in January 2016. Spending long nights in a loaned carriage house on the shores of Lake Michigan in the dead of winter we laid the base of the album. Eerie and weird sounds coming from a lack of sleep and too much Jim Beam. Then moving to an old out-of-use church in the peak of a Grand Rapids summer, and recording vocals in a sweaty un-AC'd confessional booth. Hitting 'record' only between firework explosions and poltergeist hijinx. Then moving into multiple other garages, bedrooms, and parlors to end up sitting with Jacob, holding his newborn baby, in the mixing booth (a screened-in porch) and finishing THTD.

You'll hear personal field recordings from the Camino in Spain, the Bells of Albury in England, my little friend Snar, confused Spanish radio signals, Fatima of the Casa del Sol farm, and more. You'll hear my friends lending their incredible musical talents to each track. You'll hear songs that have been played live for two to three years already and some that have rarely seen the light of stage. You'll hear the production wizardry of Jacob the Skuzz-man. All of these coalesce to bring you along on the Early Magic Mystery Tour inside the Tangerine Dream. 

-----

This is where we need your help. We are asking for $5,000. This money will go to cover the costs of producing the vinyl, CDs, & artwork, and paying artists who contributed their skills (design, photography, mastering, recording, playing).  

We have some pretty dope perks for giving. Obviously the vinyl, CD, & digital album but also: Cassette Tapes, Buttons, Madcap Coffee, Tangerine Dream Photo Zine, Poetry written specifically for the record, and House shows.   

I hope that you will take part in bringing this Tangerine Dream to fruition. I'm really excited for you to get to hear and experience this record! Thanks in advance for your love and support.  

You can also help by sharing this campaign with your communities. Thank you so much!

oxoxox, 

Tom Hymn

"Don't you get down, no, it's not even real. They will print more tomorrow."

"It was all just a dream. It's all that it seems. It's not what it seems. It's all that it seems."

Over the sea to walk across countries. Sleeping in dimly lit hostels with new friends from all over the globe. Sitting in living rooms watching Cosmos. Slaying old monsters that you were told would devour you if you didn't live a certain way. Spilling your guts with loved ones in city apartments. Internet dating schemes gone awry. Driving through the Tobacco Roots with your dad. Stealing riffs from your favorite bands. Searching for some internal release only to be given a different answer. Finding yourself grasping and then being reminded to let go. This is Tom Hymn's Tangerine Dream.

My good droog, Jacob Bullard (Major Murphy, Antrim Dells), and I began putting these dreams-turned-to-song down on tape in January 2016. Spending long nights in a loaned carriage house on the shores of Lake Michigan in the dead of winter we laid the base of the album. Eerie and weird sounds coming from a lack of sleep and too much Jim Beam. Then moving to an old out-of-use church in the peak of a Grand Rapids summer, and recording vocals in a sweaty un-AC'd confessional booth. Hitting 'record' only between firework explosions and poltergeist hijinx. Then moving into multiple other garages, bedrooms, and parlors to end up sitting with Jacob, holding his newborn baby, in the mixing booth (a screened-in porch) and finishing THTD.

You'll hear personal field recordings from the Camino in Spain, the Bells of Albury in England, my little friend Snar, confused Spanish radio signals, Fatima of the Casa del Sol farm, and more. You'll hear my friends lending their incredible musical talents to each track. You'll hear songs that have been played live for two to three years already and some that have rarely seen the light of stage. You'll hear the production wizardry of Jacob the Skuzz-man. All of these coalesce to bring you along on the Early Magic Mystery Tour inside the Tangerine Dream. 
-----

This is where we need your help. We are asking for $5,000. This money will go to cover the costs of producing the vinyl, CDs, & artwork, and paying artists who contributed their skills (design, photography, mastering, recording, playing).  
We have some pretty dope perks for giving. Obviously the vinyl, CD, & digital album but also: Cassette Tapes, Buttons, Madcap Coffee, Tangerine Dream Photo Zine, Poetry written specifically for the record, and House shows.   
I hope that you will take part in bringing this Tangerine Dream to fruition. I'm really excited for you to get to hear and experience this record! Thanks in advance for your love and support.  

You can also help by sharing this campaign with your communities. Thank you so much!
oxoxox, 
Tom Hymn
"Don't you get down, no, it's not even real. They will print more tomorrow."
"It was all just a dream. It's all that it seems. It's not what it seems. It's all that it seems."

story:
Experience our EP "ANCESTORS" Download it for Free
https://sunsoftheearth.bandcamp.com/album/ancestors-ep

Short Summary

"We are the ones we've been waiting for" -Is a famous quote from the Hopi Prophecies about this unique juncture of time that we are living in. It speaks to a philosophy of radical self-responsibility, and embodied leadership. That WE as a people are the "ones" we've been waiting for to make a real difference, a real change on our planet. Our music is an invitation to humanity to be that change, to be the one... to be those Ones

Welcome to the Suns of the Earth Indiegogo Campaign.

As a band, our goal is to create and record our music in a way that will inspire explorations into the new paradigms that exist within the lyrics, medicine and music of our songs. We feel empowered to create and sing songs that honor the earth, each other and preserve what is most sacred for future generations. We recognize a new culture returning; one that is holistic, sustainable and celebrates unity creatively. We are dedicated to co-dreaming this music project and this new culture into existence and we have many goals, visions and future initiatives that we're excited to create together. This is where we start.

The opportunity to co-create an album with the love and support of our greater community is a joy for us and will help us to bring forward a message we feel is in alignment with everyone's common goals. Your contribution not only makes it possible for us to record, mix, master, print and distribute our first record, you're directly helping launch our project as a whole out into the world.

What We Need & What You Get

Our Goal is $33,000. This will cover all the necessary components to bring the album out into the world and launch the project as a whole. We’ve lined up some amazing perks to thank you for your generosity.  

Here is what your contributions will be supporting :

$15,000 - Professional Recording, Mixing, and Mastering.

$2,000  - Featured Artists on the record

$3,500 - Marketing

$1,500 - Graphic Design & Web support

$3,000 - Print CD’s

$2,000 - Initial opportunity gigs

$3,000 - Video Budget

$500 - Legalities

$2,000 - Indiegogo & PayPal Fees

Some of our unique perks include :

Every Donation offered brings you our just released live recorded EP “Ancestors."  This EP was created specially for the launch of this campaign in order to give you a taste of how amazing the upcoming album will be.

Other unique perks include : Signed pre-released albums, traditional Shipibo & other amazonian traditional tapestries and bracelets, healing sessions, music & song development consultations with Tete Bero, and a Private Cacao Ceremony anywhere in the U.S.  Aloka will even get a tattoo of the band logo on his body to show his dedication to their mission!

We are determined to make this an amazing record, Thank you for helping us exceed our goal!

By helping us exceed our goal you are supporting the potential impact of this music on the planet.


The Impact

We hold a vision in our hearts of sovereign land projects where we can all raise our children with clear water, clean air, healthy food, healthy songs, loving people, sustainable infrastructure, technologies and universal wisdom. We are here to resonate our message that we are all part of a global village. Join us and help make a real impact toward creating that dream.  We feel capable and confident that we can make this music accessible to the mainstream public in a way that will truly inspire people to explore new choices that live within the message of our music. With our devotion to building community the potential impact of our music is unity. We are committed to supporting other artists' sharing their gifts, conscious organizations, holistic products, festivals, healing modalities and projects that share the same ideals for planetary transformation as we grow in our success.

Other Ways You Can Help

Not in a position to contribute monetarily? That’s ok, we still appreciate your support!

There are a number of ways that you can still assist us :

  • Ask others to also spread the word and make some noise about our campaign

  • You can utilize the Indiegogo share tools or simply copy and paste the link and post to social media, email, etc.

  • Consider sending a personal message to friends and family that would truly resonate with the music and message

  • Like our FB page : https://www.facebook.com/sunsoftheearth

  • Have a product that you want to share > we can create an additional perk to support the campaign? Yay! Co-Creation

Thank you so much! We are touched by your support.

Risks & Challenges

Our greatest gift to give is our music, and with every gift there is a challenge. These challenges for us are mostly internal, they live within our soul and the process of developing ourselves and sharing ourselves as authentically as possible with the world. Externally they have to do with our contemporary world as a whole, they have to do with the challenges we are facing as a planet and as a species. Our challenge is unique unto us, but we are all in the same boat. If we don’t make adjustments as a planetary culture we run the risk of losing what is most sacred, healing, and supportive to our existence on earth.

"Evolution ingrained in our DNA
Revelation, learning how to Play
Learning how to let go,
Calling in our Prayers

This is how we live,
This is why we stayed
Love shall return
Love Shall Pervade"
